advanced-settings.attachments-info:
A Attach is used to add custom information from customer of a service or of the purchased item

Example:.

Item Purchased -> "Official shirt of the Brazilian team "

Attach name -> " Custom "

key 1 -> key Name: " name "Maximum characters allowed: 20
key 2 -> key Name: "Number " allowed values: "5,7,9,10,11 "

This means that an official shirt of the Brazilian Team will have a Attach called "Custom ", mandatory or not, whose keys are the "name " and "Number " to be printed on the shirt purchased as the customer's choice. The customer can enter a name up to 20 characters (you can enter a free name), but will have to choose between numbers 5, 7, 9, 10 and 11 (can not enter the numbers you want).

If you want to register a new Attach not yet existing in the System

sellers.label: Sellers

info.1:
This guide has the functionality of reassociating this SKU to another SKU registered in the system by other seller.

The scenario, for example, is when the SKU is sold by Sellers X and Y, but there was a hint of approval created two Products, one for each Seller, instead of associating the SKU and maintain a Product only.
This case may occur when the approved SKUs have different EANs. It’s desirable to unite the duplicated SKUs in a single Product.

sku-attach-service-price.title: Attach Service(s) Value(s) to SKU(s)
sku-attach-service-price.description-header: How to attach service values to SKUs?
sku-attach-service-price.description1: Check the Help for the admin before importing the service values to attach to SKUs.
sku-attach-service-price.description2: To export service values from a specific category, click with the right mouse button in the list of categories in the right-side menu.
sku-attach-service-price.description3: Always select the most internal category of the desired department. This will make the listing, exporting and importing happen faster.
sku-attach-service-price.description4: If you want to import values, export a spreadsheet and use it as a model.
sku-attach-service-price.description5: Make the changes to import new values with Excel or similar.
sku-attach-service-price.description6: After you open the file, if you get a notification about a different file format from specified in the extension, ignore it selecting the option "Yes, open the file now ".
sku-attach-service-price.description7: Do not change the original file format (XML Spreadsheet 2003 with extension *.xls). Whenever you save the document, keep your current format even if some resources are unavailable.
sku-attach-service-price.description8: The spreadsheet file size cannot exceed 4Mb (4096KB).
sku-attach-service-price.description9: Edit the spreadsheet carefully, always verifying if the information are being correctly filled.
sku-attach-service-price.upload-subtitle: File Upload with the values to be attached
sku-attach-service-price.category-subtitle: Right-click a category and select 'list' to see the services in a category.
sku-attach-service-price.hover-see-errors: Hover over to see the errors the system returned.

sku-report.title: Export and Import SKUs and Products
sku-report.export-info:
Attention

The export refers to a complete report of Products and SKU, containing more information than the list found here.

After the data is processed, you will receive a link by e-mail to download the generated spreadsheet.

We recomend exporting up to 10.000 records. If the number of records is much bigger than this, the process can take long.

Use the filters to refine your search.

Wait for the export completed notification email. Depending on the search filters, the process can take a few minutes.
sku-report.import-info:
Attention, manage the spreadsheet with care, always verifying if the product and SKU information is filled correctly.


If you want to register more than one SKU for the same product, edit just the information about the SKU and keep the values of the following columns for that product:

_IdProduto, _NomeProduto, _TextoLink, _IdCategoria, _IdMarca, _CodigosLojas

Columns that will have the default value "NÃO" (NO) when creating a new record: _SkuAtivo (ActiveSKU) and _ProdutoAtivo (ActiveProduct).

If you want to force a value for the column _IdProduto (ProductID), make sure it's a new record and that it has a unique _TextoLink (LinkText).

If you want to edit the column _TextoLink (LinkText), make sure it will be changed for ALL SKUs of that product.

The column _AtivarSkuSePossível (ActivateSKUIfPossible) will inactivate the SKU with the "NÃO" (NO) value. In case of "SIM" (YES) value, the system will activate the SKU if the necessary requisites are met.

The following columns are present just to make reading the data easier, and will be ignored if edited or created: _NomeCategoria (NameCategory), _NomeMarca (NameBrand) and _NomeDepartamento (NameDepartment)
Edit only the following columns: _IdCategoria (IdCategory) and _IdMarca (IdBrand).

The following columns must be filled with the IDs for the SKUs separated by ',' (comma) during import: _Acessorios (Accessories), _Similares (Similars) and _Sugestoes (Suggestions)

The column _Anexos (Attachments) must be filled with the names of the attachments to be associated to SKUs, separated by ',' (comma).

OBS: At least one of the columns below must be filled when a new SKU is created in the spreadsheet: _SkuEan (SKU EAN) or _CodigoReferenciaSKU (SKUReferenceCode)

Values valid for the column _UnidadeMedida (UnitMeasure): "un", "kg", "g", "mg", "m", "m²", "m³", "cm", "cm²", "cm³", "mm", "mm²", "mm³";

Attention to the mandatory columns to register a new SKU in the spreadsheet:

_NomeSku (SKUName), _NomeProduto (ProductName), _AtivaSkuSePossível (ActivateSKUIfPossible) _ExibeNoSite (DisplayOnSite) _UnidadeMedida (UnitMeasure) _IdCategoria (CategoryId), _IdMarca (BrandId), _TextoLink (LinkText), _MultiplicadorUnidade (UnitMultiplier) , _Peso (Weight), _Altura (Height), _Largura (Width), _Comprimento (Length), _ExibeSemEstoque (DisplayWithoutStock)

Attention to the columns that should NOT be changed for existing records

_SkuId (SKUId), _SkuAtivo (ActiveSKU), _ProdutoAtivo (ActiveProduct), _NomeCategoria (CategoryName), _NomeMarca (BrandName), _IdDepartamento (DepartmentId)

The import will not run if any necessary column is blank in the sheet.

product-specification-exportation-import.title: Product Specification Exportation and Importation
product-specification-exportation-import.attention-text:
Check the products/SKUs specification importation manual.

To import, use a previously exported spreadsheet. To obtain it, choose a category from the left menu and then the option "Export", accessible after right-clicking it.

Always select the innermost category from the desired department. This will make the listing, exportation and importation process go faster.

After clicking the "Export" button, choose the "Save As" option and choose the appropriate place to save the spreadsheet.

Modify the exported values with the spreadsheet editor Microsoft Excel or compatible.

Do not change the file original format (XML Spreadsheet2003 with the *.xls extension). Whenever saving the document, keep its current format even if some funcionalities become unavailable.

Only modify the column "Valor(es) de Especificação do Produto" from the spreadsheet. The other columns must remain unaltered because their values will be used for data validation.

For the fields of type "Text", there will be no content in the column "Possíveis Valores do Campo Produto". Just insert/remove the text in/from the column "Valor(es) de Especificação do Produto".

For the fields of type "Long text", the procedure is the same as the one for fields of type "Text". However, you may add the text "#novalinha#" (without the enclosing double quotes) to set a line break in the text.

For the fields of type "Radio or Combo", copy the exact content of only one of the values listed in the column "Possíveis Valores do Campo Produto".

For the fields of type "Checkbox", copy the exact content of one or more values listed in the column "Possíveis Valores do Campo Produto". Separate the different values using commas, with up to one whitespace between the comma and the next value.

Edit the spreadsheet with extreme caution, always checking if everything was filled in correctly.
product-specification-exportation-import.right-click-category: Right-click a category and select list to see the products in a category.

sku-specification-exportation-importatio.title: SKU Specification Exportation and Importation
sku-specification-exportation-importatio.attention-text:
Check the products/SKUs specification importation manual.

To import, use a previously exported spreadsheet. To obtain it, choose a category from the left menu and then the option "Export", accessible after right-clicking it.

Always select the innermost category from the desired department. This will make the listing, exportation and importation process go faster.

After clicking the "Export" button, choose the "Save As" option and choose the appropriate place to save the spreadsheet.

Modify the exported values with the spreadsheet editor Microsoft Excel or compatible.

Do not change the file original format (XML Spreadsheet2003 with the *.xls extension). Whenever saving the document, keep its current format even if some funcionalities become unavailable.

Only modify the column "Valor(es) de Especificação do SKU" from the spreadsheet. The other columns must remain unaltered because their values will be used for data validation.

For the fields of type "Text", there will be no content in the column "Possíveis Valores do Campo SKU". Just insert/remove the text in/from the column "Valor(es) de Especificação do SKU".

For the fields of type "Long text", the procedure is the same as the one for fields of type "Text". However, you may add the text "#novalinha#" (without the enclosing double quotes) to set a line break in the text.

For the fields of type "Radio or Combo", copy the exact content of only one of the values listed in the column "Possíveis Valores do Campo SKU".

For the fields of type "Checkbox", copy the exact content of one or more values listed in the column "Possíveis Valores do Campo SKU". Separate the different values using commas, with up to one whitespace between the comma and the next value.

Edit the spreadsheet with extreme caution, always checking if everything was filled in correctly.
sku-specification-exportation-importatio.table-title: Right-click a category and select list to see the products in a category.

sku-image-exportation-page.title: SKU Images Exportation
sku-image-exportation-page.box-text:
To export the images report, fill in your email below.
We recommend you export up to 10,000 records, use the filters to refine your search.
Once the process is completed, you will receive an email with the link to download your spreadsheet.

product-ratings-exportation-page.title: Product Ratings Exportation (Review)
product-ratings-exportation-page.instructions1: To export a spreadsheet, right-click a category on the side menu and choose the option “Export”.
product-ratings-exportation-page.instructions2: Always choose the innermost category from the desired department. This will make the listing and exportation process go faster.
product-ratings-exportation-page.instructions3: After clicking on the 'Export' button, select 'Save As' and choose a place to save the spreadsheet you’ve just exported.
product-ratings-exportation-page.instructions4: View the exported values using the spreadsheet editor Microsoft Excel or compatible.
product-ratings-exportation-page.table-title: Right-click a category and select list to see the products in a category.
